description:
When Connor moves to Bubbletown, he meets Abby, Mong, Chip and Hela (the Botties), but he cannot join their group until he repairs a broken robot - Cubix. However, his work is sabotaged by the evil Dr. K, who plans to steal the precious Solex power source from Cubix.
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: 目覚めよ! コンボック
